attributes.action: Change the way the FSA is funded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Financial Services Authority is currently funded by the financial services companies it is supposed to regulate. When the salaries and bonuses of FSA staff are being paid for by the companies they regulate how on earth can they be an independent regulatory body. Presumably the banks are a major contributor to FSA costs - just look at the mess the regulator let them get into
